name: Dishes
title: Our Wonderful Dishes
alt: A vegan dish full of different types of vegtables
desc1: In our wonderful dishes, you'll find wholesome vegan meals made with affordable and protein-rich whole grains, beans, and nuts.
desc2: You'll also see plenty of fresh, colorful produce, and occasionally some tofu. No funny meat substitutes here.

name: Desserts
title: Our Delicious Desserts
alt: A vegan dessert dish with banana
desc1: In our delicious desserts, you'll find the  best vegan desserts, include plant-based twists on classic recipes with creative frozen treats, cakes, and more!
desc2: No matter what you're craving, you're guaranteed to find a sweet treat you love.

name: Drinks
title: Our Tasty Drinks
alt: A mug of vegan hot drink
desc1: If you think it's only the use of milk and milk products that come from animals that make a drink non-vegan, think again.
desc2: Whether you want something bright and fruity or crave creaminess sans the cream, our tasty vegan drinks will make your tastebuds sing.
